summary: This mod adds the ability for the player to cast spells like Oakflesh and Ironflesh on single targets and groups of NPCs. You can also cast spells like Flamecloak on single targets..
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the ability for the player to cast spells like Oakflesh and Ironflesh on single targets and groups of NPCs. You can also cast spells like Flamecloak on single targets.

I made this mod because I wanted a bigger selection of spells to buff my followers.

The spells have been added to the appropriate levelled item lists and can be sold by spellbook vendors. You can also get them by going to the cell qasmoke and pickiing the books up off the table.

[youtube]4F719T3BpvU[/youtube]

This mod does not require any DLC.

There are no known compatibility issues.

To install this mod, download the .rar and use the nexus mod manager. Or you can drop the .esp file into your Data directory if you don't use the mod manager.

Created by mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger.

=============
RELEASE NOTES
=============

========================
v1.0.0
========================

Date of release: 23/05/2015
Purpose: Initial release
Notes: This is the first public release version, it adds the ability for the player to cast spells like Oakflesh and Ironflesh on single targets and groups of NPCs. You can also cast spells like Flamecloak on single targets.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

========================
